content.rendered:
Front End Development Course

Front End Development course is designed for beginners who want to learn the fundamental skills and technologies required to create professional websites and user interfaces for websites and web applications.

Whether you’re aspiring to become a front-end developer or looking to enhance your web design skills, this course will provide you with a solid foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, as well as practical hands-on experience. Vmaxinfo Instituteoffer best Front End Development course in puneas classroom training. Front End Development course is also available online for all students in India and out of India.

Front End Development Course Details:

Vmaxinfo Institutehas design the Front End Development course for all students considering the requirement of IT industries requirement for Front End Development. The course cover lot of assignments with practical and industrial projects. Most of the course structure is like below.

Introduction to Front End Development

  • Understanding the role of front-end development
  • Overview of web technologies
  • Setting up your development environment

HTML Fundamentals

  • Introduction to HTML
  • HTML Document Structure
  • HTML Elements and Attributes
  • Creating Forms and Input Fields
  • HTML5 Semantic Elements

CSS Fundamentals

  • Introduction to CSS
  • CSS Selectors and Properties
  • CSS Layout and Box Model
  • Working with Text and Fonts
  • Responsive Web Design Principles

Styling with CSS

  • CSS Flexbox
  • CSS Frameworks (Bootstrap)
  • Creating CSS Transitions and Animations
  • Best Practices for CSS Organization

JavaScript Basics

  • Introduction to JavaScript
  • Variables, Data Types, and Operators
  • Control Structures (If statements, Loops)
  • Functions and Scope
  • Handling User Events

DOM Manipulation

  • Understanding the Document Object Model (DOM)
  • Selecting and Modifying DOM Elements
  • Handling User Input and Events
  • Creating Interactive Web Pages

Building Responsive Web Pages

  • Media Queries and Responsive Design
  • Mobile-First Design Approach
  • Testing and Debugging for Different Devices

Introduction to Version Control

  • Working with Git and GitHub
  • Collaborative Front End Development

Project: Creating a Personal Portfolio Website

  • Apply HTML, CSS, and JavaScript skills
  • Responsive design for various screen sizes
  • Showcase your projects and skills

Course Benefits:

  • Hands-on projects and exercises
  • Real-world examples and case studies
  • Regular quizzes and assignments to reinforce learning
  • Access to a community and discussion forum for support
  • Completion certificate
  • Career guidance and job assistant

Course Duration:

  • 3 Months – Monday – Friday
  • Daily 2 Hrs
  • Week End Extra Practice
  • Career Guidance sessions
  • Week End Batches are also available.

Prerequisites: No prior coding experience is required. A basic understanding of how the internet works and a passion for web design and development are helpful. You can do this course even after on 10 class.

Who can do this course

  • Aspiring front-end developers
  • Web designers
  • Entrepreneurs and business owners looking to build their own websites
  • Anyone interested in creating visually appealing and user-friendly websites

Feel free to expand upon each module with specific lessons, examples, and resources. You can also include information about instructors, course duration, and any additional materials or software students may need. This is just a starting point, and you can customize the course content to meet your specific goals and audience.

Other courses:

Web Design

UI UX Design

Web Development
